name: pnp-devproxy-simulate-azure-openai
title: Simulate Azure OpenAI API
shortDescription: This sample contains a preset that allows you to easily simulate the Azure OpenAI API using Dev Proxy. Simulating Azure OpenAI using Dev Proxy is useful when you're working on parts of your app that don't require a real-response from an LLM and don't want to incur unnecessary costs.
longDescription: This sample contains a preset that allows you to easily simulate the Azure OpenAI API using Dev Proxy. Simulating Azure OpenAI using Dev Proxy is useful when you're working on parts of your app that don't require a real-response from an LLM and don't want to incur unnecessary costs.

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of a command prompt with Dev Proxy simulating response for a request to Azure OpenAI API.

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.

references.name: OpenAIMockResponsePlugin documentation
references.description: The documentation of the OpenAIMockResponsePlugin for the Dev Proxy.
